name: One-on-One Tutoring
description: Get personalized guidance tailored to your learning pace and specific needs. I provide comprehensive support for understanding complex concepts in web development.

name: Full Stack Development Training
description: Master the complete web development stack from frontend to backend. Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and database management with hands-on projects.

name: React.js Advanced Mastery
description: Deep dive into React.js with advanced patterns and best practices. Learn state management, hooks, performance optimization, and building scalable applications.

name: Node.js Backend Development
description: Build robust backend applications using Node.js and Express.js. Learn API development, authentication, database integration, and server-side best practices.

name: AI Integration in Web Apps
description: Learn how to integrate AI and machine learning into your web applications. Explore OpenAI APIs, chatbots, and intelligent features using modern tools.

name: Career Mentoring & Guidance
description: Get expert guidance on your tech career journey. Includes resume building, interview preparation, portfolio development, and industry insights.

name: Real-World Project Development
description: Work on real-world projects to build your portfolio and gain hands-on experience. From concept to deployment, learn industry practices and technologies.

name: Web Design & UI/UX Principles
description: Learn to create beautiful and user-friendly web interfaces. Master responsive design, modern CSS techniques, and user experience best practices.

name: Database Design & Management
description: Master database design and management. Learn SQL, NoSQL databases, schema design, query optimization, and data security practices.

name: Git & Version Control Mastery
description: Master Git and GitHub for professional version control. Learn collaboration workflows, branching strategies, and best practices for team development.

name: Performance Optimization & SEO
description: Optimize your web applications for speed and search engines. Learn performance metrics, code splitting, lazy loading, and SEO best practices.

name: Cloud Deployment & DevOps
description: Learn to deploy and manage applications on cloud platforms. Covers deployment strategies, CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, and scalability best practices.
